release.description: This release of Phonebook Search is a component of the integrated release 6.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Modified to default to the publicly available Search Service instead of localhost.

release.description: This release of Phonebook Search is a component of the integrated release 5.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added support for indexing PDS Affiliate products. Inherited from search-service.
Initial release of the Phone Book Search interface that queries the Search Service for Product_Context products containing the PDS_Affiliate class and displays the results to the user.
